simplesocial.client

Class PostNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplesocial.client.PostNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remote, Follower

    public class PostNotifier
extends Object
implements Follower
    An RMI callback. Implements Follower interface. Represents a User's follower (i.e. another online SimpleSocial client).
    Author:
    Francesco Landolfi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostNotifier(BlockingQueue<Post> posts)
      PostNotifier constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void sendUpdate(Post post)
      Sends a Post to the follower.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostNotifier

        public PostNotifier(BlockingQueue<Post> posts)
        PostNotifier constructor. The given posts queue will be updated every time the callback will be called (i.e. a followed User posts something).
        Parameters:
        posts - a BlockingQueue of posts

    • Method Detail

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(Post post)
                throws RemoteException
        Sends a Post to the follower. The given Post will be stored in the queue passed to the constructor.
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface Follower
        Parameters:
        post - the Post to be sent
        Throws:
        RemoteException - communication-related exception
